name: Robert Bryant MELSON, Applicant, v. Jefferson S. DUNN, Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert Bryant MELSON, Applicant,
v.
Jefferson S. DUNN, Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections, et al.

opinions.text:
UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicant,
IT IS ORDERED that execution of the sentence of death is hereby stayed pending further order of the undersigned or of the Court.
/s/ Clarence Thomas
Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States
opinions.author: Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States

casebody.head_matter:
Robert Bryant MELSON, Applicant,
v.
Jefferson S. DUNN, Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections, et al.
No. 16A1212.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 08, 2017.
ORDER
